html:
Amazon is offering some intriguing deals on Apple products at the moment, including a deeply discounted M2 MacBook Air, iPad mini 7, and a nice little discount on the latest M3 iPad Air.

Check out the deals!

M2 MacBook Air 13″ for $749

Amazon is discounting the M2 MacBook Air 13″ model for $749 in the 16GB RAM / 256GB configuration with silver color (other color options may be available at this price point periodically) , taking 25% off the original $999 MSRP. While Apple recently spec-bumped the MacBook Air to M4 processors, the newest models start at $949, so if you don’t need the latest and greatest M4 chip you can save some cash and get the M2 model for quite a bit cheaper.

  • M2 MacBook Air 16/256 – silver color – $749

iPad mini 7 – $399 (down from $499)

iPad mini 7 is the latest iPad mini model with the A17 processor with Apple Intelligence support, 8″ LCD display, 12mp front and rear cameras, 128 GB storage, USB-C charging, and support for the optional Apple Pencil Pro. You can find the latest model at the discounted price in space grey, blue, silverlight, or purple color options:

  • iPad mini 7 – $399 (down from $499)

M3 iPad Air 11″ and 13″ – $50 Off Retail Starting at $549

The M3 iPad Air is already discounted by Amazon, taking 8% off the retail price of $599 and bringing it down to $549 for the 11″ model, and taking $50 off the 13″ model too. The newest model iPad Air includes the M3 chip with Apple Intelligence support, Liquid Retina LCD display, 128GB storage, 12MP front and rear camera, Touch ID on the power button, great battery life, support for Apple Pencil Pro, and is available in a variety of color options.

  • M3 iPad Air 11″ – $549 (down from $599 retail)
  • M3 iPad Air 13″ – $749 (down from $799)
